main.description: Declaration of an aggregator service that can post to communities. Published in the aggregator's own repository. Similar to app.bsky.feed.generator and app.bsky.labeler.service.

did.description: DID of the aggregator service (must match repo DID)

description.description: Description of what this aggregator does

configSchema.description: JSON Schema describing config options for this aggregator. Communities use this to know what configuration fields are available.

sourceUrl.description: URL to aggregator's source code (for transparency)

maintainer.description: DID of person/organization maintaining this aggregator
